pr_title: Add more clear warning message instructing users how to enable reusable containers

timeline.body:
Maybe we should make it a bit Windows friendlier? :)

```suggestion
                    logger().warn("To enable reuse of containers, you must set 'testcontainers.reuse.enable=true' in a file located at $HOME/.testcontainers.properties");
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
